Sentencas: Alkaline earth-doped LaCrO(3) is a satisfactorily conducting ceramic material for the interconnector of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of lanthanum chromite powder

Sentencas: For the synthesis of highly sinterable LaCrO(3) powders spray-drying of adequate precursors like sols based on alkoxides has been used Lanthanum chromium hydroxide sol was prepared by hydrolysis of synthesized methoxide complexes.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of lanthanum chromite powder

Sentencas: The chemical reactions during hydrolysis and peptization of the precursors are described.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of lanthanum chromite powder

Sentencas: The crystalline phase formation during heat treatment of spray-dried amorphous gel consisting of hydroxides and contaminant chloride ligands was characterized by thermal analysis methods (TG, DTG, DTA) and X-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of lanthanum chromite powder

Sentencas: The progressive oxidation of Cr(III) by thermal dehydroxylation transforms the powder into fine crystallized La(III)
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of lanthanum chromite powder

Sentencas: Cr(V)hydroxo-oxychloride at 450 degrees C. A thermal treatment permits complete chlorine removal forming sinterable crystalline LaCrO(3) perovskite powder at temperatures above 720 degrees C.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of lanthanum chromite powder

Sentencas: The same sol-gel process also can be applied to chlorine-free nitrate-containing alkoxide Sols.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of lanthanum chromite powder

Sentencas: The properties of sinterable lanthanum chromite powders obtained from these sols are compar ed with powders made by direct spray-drying of lanthanum-chromium nitrate solutions.
